msbt.message: No! ? Is that you?<10_4 /> You've been away for <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" />! What HAVE you been doing?! I don't mean to blame you<10_4 /> You've come back and seem to be well, and that's all that matters. I-I'm sorry. I'm just overwhelmed! Oh, Welcome home, !

Well, wellit's !<10_4 /> Why, I haven't seen you in <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />. Maybe it's because you haven't been around, but the island just hasn't been the same lately. It's been so gloomy without you. I can hardly stand it. So, thank you for returning home to us.

Oh my, , how ARE you?<10_4 /> It feels like forever since we've spoken like this. Oh dear, I can't even remember what sorts of things we used to talk about.If you'd stayed away any longer, I might have forgotten you completely!I kid! I kid! That was just a little joke, darling. You came back, so all is well. Welcome home, .

Oh, nice to meet you Wait, ?! Is that really you? My word, where have you been all this time?! Why would you neglect the island like this?! I hate to sound needy, but we've been so lonely without you, !

Oh my?!<10_4 /> When was the last time I saw you? It's been FOREVER, darling! Returning home after so long You must have so many things you want to do! Well, enjoy . It's a better place when you're in it.

No! ?! <10_4 />Ooooh, you came back! But where on earth did you go?! When you're not on the island, I swear, nothing is the same! It's just awful! I don't enjoy like I used to, and doesn't even taste sweet anymore! I'm sorry, but I was so lonely while you were away!

Oh my, now here's a face I haven't seen in quite some time! What on earth kept you away for so long?Well, the important thing is that you seem well. Knowing you, you've been keeping very busy. Do spend some time on the island, even if just for today, .
Oh, . It seems like ages since the last time we talked.It must have been about <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" /> ago, now. It's hard not to take that personally, my dear.

Well, well. Where have you been for the last <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />?I've heard about you from the others a few times, butYou and I not speakingâ€”surely it's just a case of bad timing and coincidence Right, ?

Oh, .<10_4 /> It's been a while since you and I had a chance to talk like this.I believe our last chat wasabout <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" /> ago. I have a good memory for these things, you know.We live on the same island I guess I find it quite sad, .
